title: The Lord of the Rings
desc: The Lord of the Rings is an epic high-fantasy novel written by English author and scholar J. R. R. Tolkien.
body: The story began as a sequel to Tolkien's 1937 fantasy novel The Hobbit, but eventually developed into a much larger work.
author: J. R. R. Tolkien

title: The Hobbit
desc: The Hobbit is a children's fantasy novel by English author J. R. R. Tolkien.
body: The story began as a sequel to Tolkien's 1937 fantasy novel The Hobbit, but eventually developed into a much larger work.
author: J. R. R. Tolkien
